question.title: Q: Context VS Namespace
question.questionText: If I have two projects to be deployed in one k8s cluster. I should define multiple resource of which one in below?
question.correctMsg:
Comments: Context: https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/access-application-cluster/configure-access-multiple-clusters
Follow-up: - Why people need multiple namespaces? Why people need multiple context? - List some security vulnerabilities with namespace and context in current k8s version.
question.incorrectMsg:
Comments: Context: https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/access-application-cluster/configure-access-multiple-clusters
Follow-up: - Why people need multiple namespaces? Why people need multiple context? - List some security vulnerabilities with namespace and context in current k8s version.
